commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Our next segment is the School Idol Presentation Contest!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: A presentation contest? What's that, zura?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We want everyone to tell us about their favorite school idols or their songs and gush about what they love about them!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So we're sharing what we love with everyone!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm totally gonna kick everyone's butts here. No one can top me when it comes to talking about school idols.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: It's not like I'm here to lose when it comes to school idols!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I'm pretty confident myself!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Me too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Then who will we have go first? Hmm. How about you, Nico?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hmph. The star of the show always goes last.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Then let's start with Emma.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Sure! I'm gonna talk about Rin Hoshizora from Î¼'s! She's always so bouncy and full of energy. Just the sight of her brings a smile to my face.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yup, yup! I totally know what you mean!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Seeing Rin bounce around the place kinda reminds me of little Neve, a baby goat I used to have back in my home country of Switzerland.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Uh, wha...?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She just makes me wanna give her a great, big hug!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Huh? I-I mean, I totally understand you wanting to hug her... But you can't just spring a hug out of nowhere, you know?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* I'll make sure I give her a heads up when I want to hug her.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Rin's physical prowess is extraordinary. Is that something she was just born with?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah! Her dance skills are amazing!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Dancing is all about rhythm and balance. In other words, it's about strengthening your core.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Rin was always good at sports, but she's also reaping the rewards of practicing every day.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Your core, huh? I'm gonna try focusing more on that from now on.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Am I right to assume that everyone's on the Rin train?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Well, Rin IS amazing, after all.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Laugh* You must really love Rin, Hanayo. Okay, who's gonna step up to the plate next?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: May I? While I could go on and on about all of the different school idols I love, Î¼'s and Aqours are above the rest for me!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hold up now! You don't have to force yourself to name us just because we're here, you know?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No, I honestly believe this! I already knew from the very beginning that you were both incredible.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But I've learned so much after working together with you all for the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Your singing and dancing are exceptional, that goes without saying. But it's also how you practice, and how you approach school idolism. The list goes on.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I still can't believe that I get to share the stage with all of you right now. That's how honored I am.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm going to put my mind into reaching and surpassing your heights in my future endeavors!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Y-You were surprisingly serious about all of that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And it was an honor!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Aww, hearing you say such nice things is making me feel all embarrassed, zura. We haven't done anything to deserve all of that!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah, I don't think we're impressive enough for you to aspire to... But having you say such great things about us makes me really happy!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Right then, Ruby! You're up next!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Okay. My favorite school idol is my sister, Dia. She's smart, beautiful, and responsible. I wanna be just like her.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This sounds less like school idols, and more like you're bragging about your sister.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh, and aside from everyone in Aqours, I love Saint Snow!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Saint Snow! Sarah and Leah's dance performances sure are mind-blowing, zura!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Uh-huh! Leah really has cat-like reflexes!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh! And this has nothing to do with school idols, but their home also doubles as a Japanese sweets cafÃ© and they know all the best foods in Hokkaido, zura!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: There's a Japanese sweets food stall out there, right? We actually consulted with them about the menu for it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Sounds like you guys get along really well.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I talk on the phone with Sarah pretty often. But if you're looking for really good friends, then Ruby and Leah are two peas in a pod.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Giggle* Leah and I've talked about a bunch of things. I make lots of discoveries and am always inspired when I talk to her.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: That's why I'm aiming to do my very best, so Leah doesn't laugh at me.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: It's nice to have a friend who you can learn from. You can push each other to greater heights.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And now, for the star of the show, Nico!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The most influential group for me has to be A-RISE. The quality of their songs and dances are phenomenal, and they're light-years ahead of other groups.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I still can't forget how taken aback I was when I first saw them. It amazed me that school idols like them actually existed.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: But if you want me to talk about my favorite school idols, then it obviously has to be Î¼'s.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's a no-brainer because they're the group who made me into a school idol.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Which is why I gotta take them to bigger and better places to repay the favor!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ooh! I suppose your own group does hold a special place in your heart.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What about you, Chika?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Me? Well...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Um, Chika? Is there some reason you're staring at me and Nico like that?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Do you mind if I go all fangirl over Î¼'s as well? I might get even more worked up than Setsuna, though!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Actually, I think I've had enough for today.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Aww, come on! Don't say that!
